duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide design services across a variety of transportation practices and lead design of complex roadway and transportation projects.
Work in several design programs to perform engineering and design tasks and apply knowledge to calculations pertaining to design.
Build engineering estimates for projects and assist project staff as needed for a variety of projects.
Mentor less experienced staff and aid in the writing of proposals as well as scheduling and budgeting of projects.

education_certification.credential: BS in Civil Engineering or related field. PE License or ability to obtain within a year of employment.
